import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './custom.css'; import Acer from '../images/acer.jpg' class Custom extends Component { handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); } render() { let CPU = ['intel 7700','intel i5 7500','intel i3 7100', 'intel pentium g4560'] let CPUlist = CPU.map(CPU => ) return (
Name Price: £500 Total Price: £500
); } } export default Custom;
